original_text: Dan will be a ruler for his people. His descendants will be equal with the other tribes of Israel.
korean_text: 단은 이스라엘의 한 지파 같이 그의 백성을 심판하리로다

sentences.original_text: Dan will be a ruler for his people
sentences.korean_translation: 단은 자기 백성의 통치자가 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: with the other tribes of Israel
